short_summary: Request for Proposal for Air Charter Services to support in-person consultations on the Tallurutiup Imanga interim management plan
description: Parks Canada requires air charter services for in-person consultations on the Tallurutiup Imanga interim management plan in the communities of Clyde River, Arctic Bay, Pond Inlet, Resolute Bay, and Grise Fiord.
duration_in_months: The duration is anticipated to be over two consecutive weeks, with a return to Iqaluit for the weekend in between. Exact itinerary and final dates may vary.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## 5P420-23-0287/B: Tallurutiup Imanga Air Charter Services

### Important Information

* **Tender Title**: Tallurutiup Imanga Air Charter Services - Community Consultations
* **Closing Date**: February 22, 2024 4:00 PM MST
* **Contract Start Date**: March 17, 2024
* **Contract End Date**: May 3, 2024

### Purpose

Parks Canada has a requirement for fixed wing transportation services to support in-person consultations on the Tallurutiup Imanga Interim Management Plan in the communities of Clyde River, Arctic Bay, Pond Inlet, Resolute Bay, and Grise Fiord. The successful bidder will provide transportation for up to 8 individuals to and from each location.

### Requirements

* Transportation will be required for 2 days in each community over a 2-week period
* The exact itinerary and final dates may vary, and changes will be mutually agreed upon
* Departure and return will be from Iqaluit, with potential for week-long travel

### Bidding Instructions

* Bids received by fax and email will be accepted as official
* Parks Canada is not currently accepting bids via SAP Ariba; bidders must submit their bid via fax or email as indicated in the solicitation document
* Bids received in-person or by courier will not be accepted
* The only acceptable email address for responses to the bid solicitation is [soumissionsouest-bidswest@canada.ca](mailto:soumissionsouest-bidswest@canada.ca)
* The only acceptable fax number for responses to bid solicitations is 1-866-246-6893

### Important Notes

* The crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement
* Documents may be submitted in either official language
* All work must be performed in accordance with the National Park Act

### Attachment

The Request for Proposal (RFP) document is available for download on the Government Electronic Tendering Service at the following URL: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32141/air-charter-services-rfp---5p420-23-0287---b_0.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32141/air-charter-services-rfp---5p420-23-0287
